activities: Stella & Dot is a direct seller of women's fashion accessories and cosmetics. We utilize a network of independent sales representatives who sign-up online and provide both public and non-public private information. We use this information to track the representative's sales activity and to process the commission earned. We also use the information to email information to them. Customer orders are submitted through our on-line order system and the customer's personal information is collected to process and ship their order.
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, United Kingdom
industrysector: Jewelry - (JLR)General Consumer Goods - (GCG)Leather & Fur Products - (LFP)Cosmetics & Toiletries - (COS)
personaldata: Independent sales representative and those expressing interest in becoming an independent sales rep.: name, address, email address, tax id number, credit card number, birthdate, phone number and banking information. Customers: name, address, email address and credit card information. Employees: name, address, tax id number, birthdate, phone number, email address and banking information.
